name: DelphiForums MyForums Light on Dark
description: This stylesheet adjusts DelphiForums' My Forums page to look more like the original page only on a dark background.
additional_info:
* The page background is dark gray with the My Forums section on black.
* The message count column is aligned to the right and will not wrap, so all new messages are easier to see at a glance.
* The link colors are blue and orange to match Delphi's logo.
* The Last Visit date information is decreased in size and subdued.
* Some text on the right panel that is not a link is recolored to light gray.

For IE users unable to make use of the buttons, click the Load as Plain CSS button and save all code to a file on your computer using the .css extension. Further instructions for adding a user stylesheet:
http://www.angehowe.com/delphi/UserStyleSheet.html

See screenshot here for comparison:
style 22398

* Updated 2/1/2012 to darken the top branding section
* Added dark brand bar.
* Updated 7/7/2012 to accommodate system changes to control center pages.
